steps.title: Draw two circles that follows a slanted direction.
steps.content: Draw two circles that follows a slanted direction. The one below should be smaller than the circle on top. Connect these circles using a rectangle.

steps.title: Draw a curved line that also connects the two circles on one side.
steps.content: Draw a curved line that also connects the two circles on one side. Sketch the horse's neck.

steps.title: Add the ears on the upper portion of the head.
steps.content: Add the ears on the upper portion of the head.

steps.title: Using the shapes you had drawn, sketch the face of the horse.
steps.content: Using the shapes you had drawn, sketch the face of the horse.

steps.title: Add the eyes using almond shapes and the nose.
steps.content: Add the eyes using almond shapes and the nose.

steps.title: Draw the horse's hair using random curved strokes.
steps.content: Draw the horse's hair using random curved strokes.

steps.title: For a more detailed look, sketch soft very short strokes on some areas of the face that is most likely darkened with shadow.
steps.content: For a more detailed look, sketch soft very short strokes on some areas of the face that is most likely darkened with shadow.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines. You can use the Tombow mono eraser. It helps to erase precisely. You can even use it to create texture or effects by erasing areas with a particular stroke.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished.

steps.title: Draw an oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw an oval for the head.

steps.title: Draw a curve on the left side of the oval for the mouth area.
steps.content: Draw a curve on the left side of the oval for the mouth area.

steps.title: Draw another oval for the middle section of the body.
steps.content: Draw another oval for the middle section of the body.

steps.title: Draw two circles on both sides of the oval to complete the body outline.
steps.content: Draw two circles on both sides of the oval to complete the body outline.

steps.title: Draw curves connecting the body and the head, also add curves on top of the head for the ears.
steps.content: Draw curves connecting the body and the head, also add curves on top of the head for the ears.

steps.title: Draw four elongated ovals for the legs.
steps.content: Draw four elongated ovals for the legs.

steps.title: Draw four sets of circles attached to rectangles for the feet, add ovals for the hooves.
steps.content: Draw four sets of circles attached to rectangles for the feet, add ovals for the hooves.

steps.title: Draw curvy lines for the mane and tail of the horse.
steps.content: Draw curvy lines for the mane and tail of the horse.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the horse.
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the horse.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your horse!
steps.content: Color your horse!

steps.title: Draw a big circle with a cross inside.
steps.content: Draw a big circle with a cross inside. On the lower part of the big circle, draw an oval-like circle that is smaller in size.

steps.title: Draw a diamond shape that is slanted sideways on each side of the upper portion of the big circle.
steps.content: Draw a diamond shape that is slanted sideways on each side of the upper portion of the big circle.

steps.title: Draw a large oblong that is slightly perpendicular to the big circle.
steps.content: Draw a large oblong that is slightly perpendicular to the big circle.

steps.title: Add four limbs attached to the oblong to make an outline of the horse's body.
steps.content: Add four limbs attached to the oblong to make an outline of the horse's body.

steps.title: Draw the tail on the rear part of the horse.
steps.content: Draw the tail on the rear part of the horse.

steps.title: Add the horse's hair using soft curved lines.
steps.content: Add the horse's hair using soft curved lines.

steps.title: Add the eyes, nose and mouth using the cross inside the big circle as guide for proper positioning of parts.
steps.content: Add the eyes, nose and mouth using the cross inside the big circle as guide for proper positioning of parts.

steps.title: Draw two curved lines connected to the small circle to make the nose look like it protrudes.
steps.content: Draw two curved lines connected to the small circle to make the nose look like it protrudes.

steps.title: Darken the outline of the body and add details to the horse's feet.
steps.content: Darken the outline of the body and add details to the horse's feet.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw an oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw an oval for the head.

steps.title: Draw another oval for the snout.
steps.content: Draw another oval for the snout. Remember to leave space for the nose holes.

steps.title: Draw the ears and mouth.
steps.content: Draw the ears and mouth.

steps.title: Draw a big oval for the body and this is the largest section of the body.
steps.content: Draw a big oval for the body and this is the largest section of the body. You must draw it bigger than the rest of the circles

steps.title: Draw two curved lines for the neck.
steps.content: Draw two curved lines for the neck.

steps.title: Draw two ovals attached to curved trapezoids for the frontal feet and add curves below the feet for the hooves.
steps.content: Draw two ovals attached to curved trapezoids for the frontal feet and add curves below the feet for the hooves.

steps.title: Draw two circles for the thighs.
steps.content: Draw two circles for the thighs.

steps.title: Draw two lines attached to trapezoids for the rear feet and add curves below the feet for the hooves
steps.content: Draw two lines attached to trapezoids for the rear feet and add curves below the feet for the hooves

steps.title: Draw curvy lines for the mane and tail of the horse.
steps.content: Draw curvy lines for the mane and tail of the horse.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the horse.
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the horse.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your horse!
steps.content: Color your horse!
